name: serf

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: debug
variants.description: Enable debugging info and strict compile warnings

description:
Apache Serf - a high performance C-based HTTP client library built upon
the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: scons
dependencies.description: SCons is a software construction tool

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description: Placeholder package for Apple's analogue to non-GNU libuuid

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependent_to.name: subversion
dependent_to.description: Apache Subversion - an open source version control system.
